content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. After that, you moved clockwise by 13 steps, reaching the Alpine ibex again but now at position 3 (it was rotated counterclockwise due to the rotation of the map). Finally, you moved clockwise by 4 steps again, which takes you back to the shipwreck.

Therefore, the final answer is: the shipwreck. You ended up back where you started. You will find the shipwreck on the circular path.
